name: Raymond A. LaPERCHE v. Marie A. LaPERCHE

parties: Raymond A. LaPERCHE v. Marie A. LaPERCHE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The state is directed to file its brief in this case on or before April 28, 1980.
DORIS, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Albert A. DiFiore, Providence, for petitioner.
Aram K. Berberian, Warwick, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
Raymond A. LaPERCHE v. Marie A. LaPERCHE.
No. 77-423-A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
March 27, 1980.
Albert A. DiFiore, Providence, for petitioner.
Aram K. Berberian, Warwick, for respondent.
